text: And the children of Benjamin went out to meet the people, and 20. 31 Gr. were emptied out of the city.were all drawn out of the city, and began to smite and slay the people as before in the roads, 20. 31 Gr. which is one going up.whereof one goes up to BÃ¦thel, and one to Gabaa in the field, about thirty men of Israel.
